title: "Early autism diagnosis breakthrough: machine learning uses eye movements on real and artificial faces"
excerpt: "In conjunction with machine learning algorithms, Eye-tracking has emerged as a critical tool for early screening and diagnosis. Studies reveal that in ASD patients, gaze to stimuli with significant social value diminishes and rises, emphasizing the possibility of gaining an early and objective diagnosis if explored."
